AccelerationFunction.description: The AccelerationFunction schema describes an acceleration function that a processor implements.  This can include functions such as audio processing, compression, encryption, packet inspection, packet switching, scheduling, or video processing.
AccelerationFunction.longDescription: This Resource shall represent the acceleration function that a processor implements in a Redfish implementation.  This can include functions such as audio processing, compression, encryption, packet inspection, packet switching, scheduling, or video processing.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AccelerationFunctionType.longDescription: This property shall contain the string that identifies the acceleration function type.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

FpgaReconfigurationSlots.description: An array of the reconfiguration slot identifiers of the FPGA that this acceleration function occupies.
FpgaReconfigurationSlots.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of the FPGA reconfiguration slot identifiers that this acceleration function occupies.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to Resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this Resource.

Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall contain a string that identifies the manufacturer of the acceleration function.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PowerWatts.description: The acceleration function power consumption, in watt units.
PowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the total acceleration function power consumption, in watt units.

Status.description: The status and health of the Resource and its subordinate or dependent Resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the Resource.

UUID.description: The UUID for this acceleration function.
UUID.longDescription: This property shall contain a UUID for the acceleration function.  RFC4122 describes methods that can create the value.  The value should be considered to be opaque.  Client software should only treat the overall value as a UUID and should not interpret any subfields within the UUID.

Version.longDescription: This property shall describe the acceleration function version.

Actions.description: The available actions for this Resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

Links.description: The links to other Resources that are related to this Resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to Resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Endpoints.description: An array of links to the endpoints that connect to this acceleration function.
Endpoints.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to Resources of the Endpoint type that are associated with this acceleration function.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PCIeFunctions.description: An array of links to the PCIeFunctions associated with this acceleration function.
PCIeFunctions.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links of the PCIeFunction type that represent the PCIe functions associated with this acceleration function.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this Resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #AccelerationFunction.v1_0_4.AccelerationFunction
